TopicTitle: No swivel engine in tutorials, unable to continue.

Articles.Content: In both the intermediate building and advanced building tutorials, I am unable to continue past a certain point because I do not have a swivel engine available for me to place, but yet I am asked to place it. How do I fix this?

Never mind, I found a topic of the same issue (it was written in Spanish so I had overlooked it at first). Either way, I was able to find the engine using the advanced filtering things on the toolbox.
